Package icyllis.arc3d.engine.ops

Class DrawOp

java.lang.Object
icyllis.arc3d.core.Rect2f
icyllis.arc3d.engine.ops.Op
icyllis.arc3d.engine.ops.DrawOp
All Implemented Interfaces:
Rect2fc
Direct Known Subclasses:
MeshDrawOp
public abstract class DrawOp extends Op
Base class for Ops that draw. These ops can draw into an OpsRenderPass's GpuRenderTarget.
